1108693643320270848.text:
Did you know that more than 70% of #Ethereum nodes are hosted in VPS,in HW not controlled by users? 

Now think about “The meaning of decentralization” by @VitalikButerin 

We count on you to make that % as insignificant as possible. 

#DecentralizationMatters
#beanodlerpic.twitter.com/O8uhsvgiFQ
